title: Strengthening Nursing Practical Competencies: Heuristic-Based Scientific Inquiry Learning Design Professional Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Over 85% of participants derived at least three innovative strategies when designing science inquiry lessons using a heuristic approach
Real-time data collection and analysis tools utilizing personal BYOD were applied in over 70% of learning activities
In the final project evaluation, 90% of participants submitted assessment reports reflecting reflective practice
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
